success.description: Indicates whether the operation completed successfully. False if an error occurred.
success.label: Success Status

mode.description: The operation mode used: 'file_explainer' (AI file analysis), 'issue_solver' (AI issue solutions), 'file' (raw file data), or 'issue' (raw issue data)
mode.label: Mode

explanation.description: AI-generated technical explanation in Markdown format. Includes file purpose, main functions, logic flow analysis, and code structure breakdown. Language matches the 'language' input parameter.
explanation.label: Explanation (Markdown)

issueExplanation.description: AI-generated explanation of the GitHub issue's problem statement, context, and background. Only present in issue_solver mode.
issueExplanation.label: Issue Explanation

flowchart.description: Mermaid.js flowchart code visualizing code execution flow and logic paths. Only present when includeFlowchart=true in file_explainer mode. Can be rendered using Mermaid.js renderers.
flowchart.label: Flowchart Code (Mermaid.js)

solutionPlan.description: Step-by-step actionable solution plan in Markdown format for fixing the GitHub issue. Includes specific file changes, code examples, and verification steps. Only present when includeSolutionPlan=true in issue_solver mode.
solutionPlan.label: Solution Plan

dataType.description: Output type for raw data modes: 'file' or 'issue'. Only present in file and issue modes.
dataType.label: Data Type

relatedFiles.description: Array of related files referenced in the GitHub issue. Only present in issue_solver mode when files are found in the issue body or comments.
relatedFiles.label: Related Files

file.description: Metadata and content of the analyzed GitHub file. Present in file_explainer and file modes.
file.label: File Details

path.description: Relative file path within the repository
path.label: File Path

content.description: Raw source code content of the file
content.label: File Content

detectedLanguage.description: Programming language detected from file extension (e.g., 'javascript', 'python', 'typescript')
detectedLanguage.label: Language

url.description: Full GitHub URL to the file
url.label: GitHub URL

issue.description: Metadata and content of the analyzed GitHub issue. Present in issue_solver and issue modes.
issue.label: Issue Details

state.description: Current state of the issue: 'open' or 'closed'
state.label: State

body.description: Full issue description/body text in Markdown format
body.label: Description

url.description: Full GitHub URL to the issue
url.label: GitHub URL

comments.description: Comments on the issue with author, body, and timestamp
comments.label: Comments

error.description: Error message describing what went wrong. Only present when success=false.
error.label: Error Message
